items.description: On top of a small boat. The introductory winged light.
On top of the mountain at the very start of Isle of Dawn.
On the ramp leading up to the Isle Temple.
Behind a light gate on the right side of the realm.
Inside the Butterfly Cave, near the end of the cave.
At the end of the Trial of Water.
At the end of the Trial of Earth.
At the end of the Trial of Air.
At the end of the Trial of Fire.
On top of the muffin rock.
At the gate leading up to the Village Islands.
Inside a small cave on the left side of the Butterfly Fields.
On a rock platform in the middle of the area.
On the back side of the middle of three islands, behind the bell.
Inside the cave on the left island with the Applauding Bellmaker.
Inside a tree after solving the 8-player puzzle.
Directly above the Prairie Temple entrance.
Near the top of the Prairie Temple.
On a low island between the first tower and entrance to the Village Islands.
On a high island left of the entrance to Sanctuary Islands.
In a small hole on the left side of the Prairie Caves. Above Stretching Guru.
In an elevated cave closer to the end of the cave. On the opposite side of the light gate towards the Exhausted Dock Worker.
On the floating islands when entering Sanctuary Islands, near the Jellyfish.
At the very bottom of the waterfalls in the middle of the island.
On the right of the three floating islands a distance away from the main island.
On the back side of the main island, close to a geyser and the home shrine.
At the very top of the main island.
At the end of the spiral cave with crabs and the large dark plant.
In the Jellyfish cave accessed from the beach on the back side of the main island.
On the left side inside the main island caves, on an elevated ledge with a small bridge.
On a platform in a tree to the right before going through the gate to the Rainy Forest.
Directly in front of a gate towards the Forest Brook.
Inside a tree house to the right of the area, above the entrance to the Elevated Clearing.
Inside a tree house to the back side of the area, above the caves.
In a small cave to the left side of the area, behind some dark plants.
At the end of the area, directly in front of the entrance to the Broken Bridge.
On the platform in the trees connected by a rope bridge.
On a rock platform close to the (missing) bridge.
On top of a small pillar after following birds to an elevated platform on the left side of the cave.
In a small cave to the left with butterfly jars. The winged light can be found above by releasing butterflies and deep calling.
Behind a gate on the right side of the area.
At the end of the cave, next to the gate to the Broken Bridge.
Inside a hollow tree on the right side.
Inside a tower to the left side.
At the end of the broken bridge.
On the left side beyond the temple shrine.
Up above in a hollow part of a tree on the right side.
Down through a tunnel in the main tree.
In one of the air tunnels of the main island.
On the left side down the slope towards the Ice Rink.
In the center of the Ice Rink.
To the left below the ice.
At the top of the Citadel.
In a window on the side of one of the tallest towers.
Near the end of the first sliding race section.
In the right of two buildings with a skywalk.
Atop a spire between rocks.
On the slope before reaching the Coliseum.
On the shoulder of the statue left of the temple door.
In a room through the upper hole of the left wall.
In a cave just below the hot springs.
In a cave near the top of smaller mountain on the left of the village.
On top of a small tower between the two elevators to Hermit Valley.
On the back side of Hermit's cave.
Looking down at the elevator, in a cave on the right side.
Hidden behind some boxes backstage.
On the beach directly in front of where you land.
On the pillars above where you land.
On a platform in the opening Krill section.
Between two walls on the right after the first Krill section.
On a large flat rock to the right, close to the campfire.
On the ground under some cover in the left Krill's path.
On a small platform on the side of the mountain with ribcage
At the stairs leading to the Battlefield.
Facing the two vertical pipes at the start, on the wall directly to the left.
Inside the lower back of the ship.
Next to a large pipe right of the climb to the Battlefield.
Near the top of the main building.
Behind the right pillar at the end.
In front of the temple shrine.
On top of the Forgotten Ark.
Inside the cave at the center back of the area.
At the top of the tallest tower.
In the submerged ruins with the hexagonal top visible above water.
On a ladder to the right of the Starlight Desert entrance.
On top of a gazebo.
In a small roofed building around the altitude of the mantas.
At the highest point of this floor, surrounded by small pillars.
On top of one of the floating bones.
In front of the temple shrine.
At the first junction, to the left behind some jars.
Up a ladder near the end of the archives maze.
On top of the lighthouse to the left.
On top of the jar to the right.
On the bottom floor of the king's island.
In a locked cell on the outside of the main building.
In the building at the end of this area.
Right in front of the tunnel near the end.
First in the tunnel before the point of no return.
Second in the tunnel before the point of no return.
Third in the tunnel before the point of no return.
Fourth in the tunnel before the point of no return.
Fifth in the tunnel before the point of no return.
Sixth in the tunnel before the point of no return.
Seventh in the tunnel before the point of no return.
Eight in the tunnel before the point of no return.
Automatically received after leaving Orbit.
Up above in the Jellyfish memory.
Up above in the Crab memory.
Up above in the Manta memory.
On the ground in the Krill memory.
Near the eye of the closests whale in the Whale memory.
At the top of the shard in the Elder memory.
